name: FAST_FOOD_EX
description:
FAST_FOOD_EX[3mx_digital 2022]

Created for the (BlitzCoder Indie Game Competition 2022)

This game is a remake of a platformer test by [Andy McAdam of Coffee Induced Games]

CONTROLS:

Left/Right keys = Move

Z = Jump

X = Shoot

(Z) in mid air = Airdash

(DOWN_KEY) in mid air = Stomp

Hold X to charge jump/release = Super Jump

Enter key = pause

[STORY]

Some vegan protester switched out the Secret spice with a real secret spice that has the power to make things

come alive, now the fast food is running amok. Chase down the burger and get that spice to and teach those vegan protesters a lesson not to mess with your fastfood diner.

[CREDITS]

created by: 3MX DIGITAL.
